name: Sleuth
description:
Check and increase your library usage file-by-file.


Sleuth helps you follow best practices by reporting on external library usage, identifying problem layers in your files, and if you choose, automatically fixing some of them.


Originally conceptualized and developed as a command-line tool for Sketch (and later for figma), Sleuth is now available as a Figma plugin. The original tool is available here.


Questions or comments or bugs? Hit up the Github Repo.


Want to work with us at Keap? Check our careers page.
